text: (Die) Hunnenschlacht (German for "[the] battle of the Huns") may refer to: *Hlöðskviða, sometimes called Hunnenschlacht, an Old Norse epic poem *Hunnenschlacht, an 1854 fresco by Wilhelm von Kaulbach *Hunnenschlacht (Liszt), an 1857 symphonic poem inspired by the painting ==See also== * *Battle of the Catalaunian Plains (451), major historical battle of the Huns
title: Hunnenschlacht
